spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is preserved, but there are distortions in the foyer and kitchen area. Door swings are inconsistent, and the entrance foyer length is shortened relative to the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Model correctly sits on a neutral dark background with roof removed. However, there is some structural reinterpretation near the utility balcony and minor geometric artifacts on external edges.

furniture_mapping.notes: Clean block-style furniture is used. Beds and sofas are accurately placed. There is a slight hallucination of an extra tall white dividing element near the dining table not found in the plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent adherence to low-poly, flat-shaded aesthetic. Camera is correctly isometric. Lighting is soft and non-dramatic as requested.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated vertical divider/pillar introduced between the dining and living area.
The foyer area (entrance) is compressed and lacks the specific geometric corner return shown in the 2D floor plan.
Kitchen counter geometry is simplified and doesn't perfectly match the L-shape proportions of the technical drawing.
